text: You are sons of the prophets, and of the covenant which God made with our fathers, saying to Abraham, ‘Yes, in your seed“Seed” is singular. Paul runs with this in Galatians 3:16. all the familiesThe reference is to patriarchal families, units much smaller than whole tribes or ethnic nations; God emphasizes the importance of the family, while Satan works to destroy it. of the earth will be blessed.’
